column2: Arana: The Heart of the Spider (2005) #9
column6: Araña goes to a very dark place as the appearance of her mother's killer awakens a thirst for vengeance. Miguel stages a magical intervention - but does she need protection from the killer...or from herself? Part 3 (of 6). 32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99,2005,9
column8: | writer:Fiona Avery | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | colorist:Udon Comics | penciller:Roger Cruz | inker:Victor Olazaba | letterer:Rus Wooton
